# hv_vcpu_get_sys_reg(_:_:_:)

**Function**

Gets the current value of a vCPU system register.

## Declaration

```swift
func hv_vcpu_get_sys_reg(_ vcpu: hv_vcpu_t, _ reg: hv_sys_reg_t, _ value: UnsafeMutablePointer<UInt64>) -> hv_return_t
```

## Parameters

- **vcpu**: The instance of the vCPU.
- **reg**: The ID of the system register.
- **value**: The value of the register `reg` on output.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/HV_SUCCESS] if the operation was successful, otherwise an error code specified in [doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_return_t].

## Discussion



## System registers

- **hv_vcpu_set_sys_reg(_:_:_:)**: Sets the value of a vCPU system register.
- **hv_sys_reg_t**: The type of system registers.
